title: Sweet potato (Ipomoea batatas L.) genotype selection using advanced indices and statistical models: A multi-year approach
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Zakaria Alam, Sanjida Akter, Md Anwar Hossain Khan, Md Iqbal Hossain, Md Nurul Amin, Avijit Biswas, Ebna Habib Md Shofiur Rahaman, Mir Aszad Ali, Debashish Chanda, Md Hasan Sofiur Rahman, Md Abu Kawochar, Md Shamshul Alam, Mohammad Mainuddin Molla, Md Monirul Islam, M.A.H.S.
